KnowledgeBase.Title: isNumber
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: integer isType isObject isInteger isMoney isPercent

Function.Description: The isNumber function returns true if the specified argument is a Number type; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isNumber function returns true if the specified argument {obj} is a Number type; otherwise, false is returned. The isNumber function will return true for Number, Integer, Money, and Percent objects
Brief.Usage: The isNumber function is used to determine if an object is a Number .

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Number, false is returned otherwise
